description:
Installs easy, no warnings. However fails almost everywhere in the windows. Unknown interfaces, No data shown, etc etc. Appears to be from 2019/Github.

https://github.com/babluboy/nutty

... "not supported".

Then why the hell is it on here !  (FEDORA)

It did everything I needed it to do, and then some.
On top of that, it was super easy to use.

10/10.
I don't love the interface necessarily, but it gets the job done.

Even though it has a dated interface, it got the job done perfectly, without me having to poke around for the wifi router management password, to find the ip addresses of computers on the network. 10/10.
summary: Got the whole job done, and well
